message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
Take the low offer, Alice! You can't do better than this!
Let's try to be a little fairer this time. I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I need a little more to be comfortable.
You're getting greedy, Alice! This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Let's meet in the middle. We can both get a decent amount of money this way.
Fine, we'll meet in the middle, but only because I'm running out of patience!
